A place to highlight relevant work hosted elsewhere!

These are intended to provide an example of what that could look like. If we decide we'd like a resource page like this, all ideas are welcome and needed for what to include.

### Equity-related research

* Michele P. Claibourn, Charlotte McClintock et al. 2019. [Charlottesville Foster Care Study.](https://doi.org/10.18130/v3-ztey-hn31) Prepared by the Public Interest Data Lab for the Charlottesville Department of Social Services, Charlottesville, VA. University of Virginia.

* Michele P. Claibourn, Charlotte McClintock et al. 2018. [Charlottesville Child Welfare Study.](https://doi.org/10.18130/v3-1j50-3z57) Prepared by the Public Interest Data Lab for the Charlottesville Department of Social Services, Charlottesville, VA. University of Virginia.
